info.name: apply_classifier_to_objects
info.description:
A module that uses an eta.core.learning.ImageClassifier to classify the
detected objects in images or videos

inputs.name: input_image_set_labels_path
inputs.description: an ImageSetLabels file describing the detected objects in images_dir

inputs.name: input_labels_path
inputs.description: a VideoLabels file containing detected objects in the input video

inputs.name: input_image_labels_path
inputs.description: an ImageLabels file containing the detected objects in image_path

outputs.name: output_image_set_labels_path
outputs.description: an ImageSetLabels file containing the predictions generated by processing images_dir

outputs.name: output_image_labels_path
outputs.description: an ImageLabels file containing the predictions generated by processing image_path

outputs.name: output_labels_path
outputs.description: a VideoLabels file containing the predictions generated by processing video_path

parameters.name: min_height_pixels
parameters.description: a minimum height, in pixels, for a bounding box to be classified

parameters.name: confidence_threshold
parameters.description: the minimum confidence required for a label to be saved

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: an optional list of object labels to classify. By default, all objects are classified

parameters.name: force_square
parameters.description: whether to minimally manipulate the object bounding boxes into squares before extraction

parameters.name: bb_padding
parameters.description: the padding to apply to each dimension of the bounding box before classification

parameters.name: classifier
parameters.description: an eta.core.learning.ImageClassifierConfig JSON describing the eta.core.learning.ImageClassifier to use
